title: What's On My Old Mac? (Macintosh IIci) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: What's On My Old Mac? (Macintosh IIci) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
What's On My Old Mac? (Macintosh IIci)
description: Now that Krazy Ken has his old Macintosh IIci (mostly) working, he decides to explore the hard disk and show you what ancient relics lie within.  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #78 - What's On My Old Mac? (Macintosh IIci)  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen
